pages.text: The Camera's settings are configured through crouching down while looking through the camera's viewfinder. This will allow you to do a couple things:$(br)$(li)Change the Camera's Shutter speed, brightening or darkening the image.$(br)$(li)To cycle through composition guides, allowing you to line up shots.$(br)$(li)To toggle flash if attachment is installed.$(br)$(li)To see current focul length and frame count, along with remaining reels.$(br)$(br).
